meanings.definition: Consisting of or relating to a group of four.
meanings.sent1: The tetradic team worked together to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The table had a tetradic design with four identical legs.
meanings.sent3: The tetradic ducks waddled in perfect formation at the pond.
meanings.sent4: Her tetradic approach to problem-solving always led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The tetradic pattern on the quilt was eye-catching and unique.

meanings.definition: Arranged in a group of four.
meanings.sent1: The tetradic flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The chairs were placed in a tetradic formation around the table.
meanings.sent3: The tetradic cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: His tetradic strategy in chess always caught his opponents off guard.
meanings.sent5: The tetradic colors of the sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: A set of four related elements or components.
meanings.sent1: The artist's painting featured a tetradic of primary colors.
meanings.sent2: The tetradic of books on the shelf caught her attention.
meanings.sent3: The chef used a tetradic of spices to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent4: The tetradic of siblings always stuck together through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The tetradic of seasons brought a variety of weather throughout the year.
